name: 3D Off-Road Truck Parking Extreme - Dirt Racing Stunt Simulator FREE
name_original: 3D Off-Road Truck Parking Extreme - Dirt Racing Stunt Simulator FREE
description:
Are you ready for Extreme Off-Road Action?!? You may think this is another simple parking game. That's where you'd be dead wrong. This game is a wicked hybrid of parking,racing and stunt games fused with dirt and fire breathing engines and studded tires. Devious traps await. Steel wrecking balls will crush you. Exploding barrels will engulf you in flames. Cranes will drop cars on you. Trains will smash into you... And that's just the tutorial levels. Will a normal parking game have you park in an active volcano? I think not. This game is so hard it will break your face. 10 fiendishly crafted levels are waiting for you. Death awaits you at every turn. Are you man (or woman) enough for the challenge?

P.S. If that didn't sound exciting enough, please go back and re-read the description in your best monster truck announcer voice.


Compatibility: This game requires iPad 2 or better, iPhone 4s or better or 5th Generation iPod Touch or better.
